eu.opends.analyzer

Class DataWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.opends.analyzer.DataWriter

  • public class DataWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    That class is responsible for writing drive-data. At the moment it is a ripped down version of similar classes used in CARS.
    Author:
    Saied

      • saveAnalyzerData

        public void saveAnalyzerData()
        Save the car data at a frequency of 20Hz. That class should be called in the update-method Simulator.java.

      • write

        public void write(DataUnit row)
        Write data to the data pool. After 50 data sets, the pool is flushed to the file.
